message: Let's make a deal. I take $60, you take $40.  It's important to settle this quickly because the value is decreasing.
I think we can both do better. This offer is fairer and keeps the money from losing value too fast.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. We both lose if this drags on. I'll take a small hit to get this done. $55 to me, and we can move on.
